title: Did Rationality Rules' debunking Jordan Peterson get his Philosophy right?
description:
Roland the Dutch philosophy student talks realism and pragmatism and where he things Peterson fits in.

Here's the powerpoint. https://1drv.ms/p/s!As-QNpUhZnQ4mETIuh5sVl338gdG 

Roland made the slides and can answer questions about it in the comments.
